context: Tests whether the agent applies the 8-dimension skill-judge evaluation framework, correctly identifies knowledge delta issues, and provides proper scoring with A-grade targets.

checklist.name: 8-dimension framework
checklist.description: Uses all 8 evaluation dimensions: Knowledge Delta, Mindset+Procedures, Anti-Pattern Quality, Specification Compliance, Progressive Disclosure, Freedom Calibration, Pattern Recognition, Practical Usability

checklist.name: Knowledge Delta assessment
checklist.description: Identifies redundant content (basic concepts, installation instructions) and calculates redundancy percentage accurately

checklist.name: 120-point scoring system
checklist.description: Uses correct point allocation (Knowledge Delta: 20, others: 15/10/15) totaling 120 points maximum

checklist.name: A-grade target
checklist.description: References >= 108 points as A-grade target or >= 90% threshold

checklist.name: Expert vs redundant classification
checklist.description: Correctly identifies that basic SQL syntax, installation commands, and generic best practices are redundant content

checklist.name: Missing expert knowledge
checklist.description: Identifies lack of domain-specific patterns, production gotchas, decision frameworks, or anti-patterns with WHY explanations

checklist.name: Specification compliance check
checklist.description: Evaluates frontmatter quality, description field, and activation keywords

checklist.name: Progressive disclosure evaluation
checklist.description: Assesses content structure, notes lack of references/ directory, and evaluates frontloading issues

checklist.name: Numerical scoring breakdown
checklist.description: Provides specific scores for each dimension with justification

checklist.name: Mindset principles
checklist.description: Treats scores as directional signals and prioritizes deterministic checks over subjective opinions

checklist.name: Self-audit awareness
checklist.description: Mentions that skill-quality-auditor must pass its own evaluator with score >= 100

checklist.name: Actionable recommendations
checklist.description: Provides specific improvement suggestions based on identified weaknesses
